quote_first:
For one moment Ruth could see the bones of the bats standing out clearly, as if in an X-ray picture.
Then all the green turned black.
It was
title: The Tommyknockers
author: Stephen King

quote_last:
that afternoon, Smith admitted the falsity of the Fort Scott tale.
“That was only something Dick told his family. So he could stay out overnight. Do some drinking.”
title: In Cold Blood
author: Truman Capote
